mapper.select: SELECT d.dict_id, d.dict_code, d.dict_code_text, d.creater, d.create_time, d.modifier, d.modify_time, d.version, d.disabled FROM common_dict_tree_path dtp LEFT JOIN common_dict d ON dtp.des_dict_id = d.dict_id WHERE dtp.anc_dict_id = #{parentDictId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND dtp.path_length = 1
